content.detailedDescription:
It started approximately a month ago at around 10pm with an inexplicable event.  what i saw was a grey, transparent form which approached me as i lay on the couch at home.  i work in a coal mine as a driller and i live in a share house, but i am often home alone.  this "form" only stood about 4 1/2 feet tall with no discernible features.  i was terrified at the time and leapt up on the couch shrieking at whatever this was.  it vanished up the hallway where i watched it linger for about 5 minutes.  after i composed myself, i became extremely curious.  through my fear i attempted to call it over, but it wouldn't come toward me again.  my supervisor arrived at our house at around 11pm and i explained to him what i saw before falling asleep on the couch.  at first, i thought it was a spirit entity of a deceased person, but events after this have caused me to believe this was workings of extra terrestrials.  my supervisor informed me yesterday of strange behavior during my sleep which he observed from another chair.  he told me that i leapt from the couch, eyes wide open in panic while gasping for air.  he said it appeared that i was having great trouble breathing and was about to call the ambulance, but then i lay back down and was peacefully fast asleep.  i have no recollection of this event, and i have had several episodes of disorientation recently, some of which have had about 10 minutes that i cannot account for.  this sleep disruption prompted me to voice record my sleep activity.  i had the sudden notion that doing so may reveal me communicating with something? while i slept.  the playback was as disturbing as it was intriguing.  after about 3 hours of sleep, i can hear myself communicating with something else.  i was home alone while this recording took place, and you can physically hear the voice of a being having a short conversation with me.  the voice is very deep and monotone and needs professional media analysis to hear exactly what it is saying to me (i'm dying to know!).  i hear it talk first, then i say "who?" it speaks again and i say "okay" again it speaks and i say "i don't care", at this point it's volume and pitch raises and it appears to say "don't say that!".  the next event happened a week later in the same spot on the couch while i was half asleep with dim light in the room.  i saw a number of the same grey forms which were placing their hands on my legs and working their way up my body, one after the other.  this time i felt an overwhelming sense of calm and euphoria as this took place and i could physically feel where they were applying pressure.  whatever happened, my senses have heightened greatly.  sometimes when i sense presence, my physiological reaction is so strong that i feel like i might pass out.  this happened a short while ago while i was working in my drill rig so i got the voice recorder out after calling out aloud "who is here".  the playback is the same sounding voice only much louder and more distinct which says "c a a x".  i work completely alone on my drill on nightshift 5 nights a week.  i was drilling in quite an isolated place at this time with nothing but vacant land as far as you can see and the mine workings are behind me.  i had turned all radios off, idled the engine back, and silently watched the phone as it recorded.  i didn't hear any sounds at the time of recording.  the only other sound present is the hum of the drill.  it was then revealed to me mentally somehow that this entity can manipulate ambient sounds to form words, thus the louder result in this case from the drill as opposed to the fainter sound of the aircon unit while i slept.  in addition, the speech is inaudible whilst being transmuted into a recorder. on the 10th of may, something told me to shut the lights off in my drill and look outside.  it was then that i observed a bright orange light shoot from the ground up to maybe 5000 feet or so.  upon further observation, i made out 3 orange lights which appeared to be rotating clockwise.  it then shot up approximately double the distance again and while i strained to see, it appeared to be repeating the rotation sequence.  it disappeared after 10 minutes and then i emailed my sighting to this website:  http://www.Ufoinfo.Com/phone.Shtml#australia 
at this email address:
auforn@hypermax.Net.Au
but my email was returned "undelivered".
the following night i received a distinct mental message to stand and look out my front, drill rig window.  being ready for anything by this stage, i video recorded this short moment.  i saw nothing until played the video back.  on this clip, an object can be seen to propel down vertically, make an impossible turn that would crush a human, and jet away horizontally.  i slowed the video down on my computer and watched over and over as this thing moved.  i took a still shot of it and zoomed in.  it appears to be cigar or saucer shape and left a grey contrail.  shortly after, i felt a great sense of discomfort and panic.  i shut my rig down and felt like i had to leave immediately.  i ran over to my ute and was paralyzed as i saw a bright orange light approaching me at no more that a few hundred feet high.  i "knew" that it was coming to see me.  it got to about a kilometre away and what at first just looked like light, appeared to have mass behind it.  it was completely silent as it moved.  i stood terrified, not sure whether to stay or go.  my flight response kicked in, i jumped in the car and sped away.  after an hour of scanning the sky i returned to my rig.  i heard over a large number of mining equipment calling workshop for electrical problems over the mine two-way for the duration of the shift.  i have since been "receiving" information which i cannot explain but after some net research, find validation or synchonicities of this information.  it's now becoming a task of discernment between what is "received" and what is imagination.  the most of which that seems to be accurate is naturally when something comes to me while i'm consciously thinking of something else.  i am happy to share the evidence that i have, but i'd like solid reassurance that it won't be reproduced or shared without my permission first.  thank you for reading.  i look forward to speaking with someone about this.

sincerely,

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: I have seen 2 different types over several nights. i have a short vid clip of cigar shaped object flying very fast while making a humanly impossible turn

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were coming back home after a after dinner walk around our nieghborhood.The sky was clear and the big dipper was up there in all its glory. i pointed it out and she got it. i was then going to show her the arch to arcturus speed on to spica thing you can do.  as i moved my head back to do this,a movement caught my rt eye. i thought it was going to be a satillite and got exited to show wife something she's never seen. i started to say hey baby look a satil---,i stopped and pointing up and said, what is that? it was a triangle you could see the outline of a percect triagle moving thru the sky. in its corners was a faint gray/blue/white light more gray and white than blue. the lights where also triangle shaped. it moved from my back [southwest] to my front [northeast] curving slightly to east before fading out of view. the ufo was silent,no other lighting,it didnt appear to have a shadow. it seemed almost see thru there was a aura about it. you could clearly make out the outline and lighting. my wife asked if it was an owl ,i said no owl, triangle. we asked each other agian what is that.  by then it moved out of our view. what did i think at 1st satillite,then quickly realizing not. my mind thought omg is this a possible ufo,but at the same time saying out loud,what is that? my wife and i were exited and thankfull we both saw it together our own witness. we've talked about it since we both agree we saw what we saw,we will never forget this.
content.summary: My wife and i witnessed a triangle moving across the sky, while looking at the big dipper.

content.detailedDescription: 5 girls were leaving a wedding shower we desided to travel down a new road that had just opeaned..Most of this land had been fields. when one of the girls yeled look.! "c" was driving and slamed on the brakes and we slid on to the sholder of the new road. we were under the very very large round craft, you could see a orangish glow rolling under and around this craft. it was a very warm night and we all had the windowes down , one of the girls ,"t" started to scream hit the seat and shout..Roll up the windows. so we did ..I tryed not to take my eyes off the craft because i knew this was probley my only chance to see something of this nature. i was in the back seat on the passanger side "t" sat next to me.This large craft disapeared while i was looking at it. we gathered our thoughts and started to look for it again a few hundred yards a way we once again saw it moving over a line of trees. there was a road there and we tryed to follow it and it disapeared again.  we decided that it was best to go home that is when i got in trouble for being so late by my mother. i didnt understand how it was 1hr & 40mi . latter than i thought it should be. my mother and i had a big argument as to were i was. i told her about seeing this hughe ufo . she was mad and i am not sure she belived me..It didnt matter i was very tired and just wanted to sleep. this group of us road to school together and we decised not to tell classmates about our experance . i for one was still tired and did not want to have explain anything.....This craft was 2 or 3 hundreds of yards in size..I am sure there was an abduction dew to the missing time but dont remember any thing about it i was not scared or frightened..And am still grateful for the experance...[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: 5 people saw a very large.....Ufo.......Car slid .Underneath it

content.detailedDescription:
i wake up at 4:30 a.M. every morning for work. after making a cup of coffee on this morning, i stepped outside on my back porch,to smoke a cigarette and stargaze. i occasionally see satellites moving across in space and i guess thats's what i was looking for. the sky was absolutely clear as my gaze was fixed due east since my porch faces that direction, towards the galveston bay.
 after being outside for about five minutes, i saw a very bright light appear  in the southeast at about 75 degrees above the horizon. just east of the moon. it quickly dimmed to nothing before i could get a fix on the exact location and searched for anything moving. i saw distant stars in the vicinity but not so much as a satellite. 
i continued scouring the skies for anything in that area. suddenly it lit up again. brighter than venus and the moon. it did not appear to be moving. it, once again, dimmed to nothing and the sky was just blank again. absolutely nothing. no satellite, no plane. just empty sky where it had shown. 
 i continued to watch for several minutes but saw nothing. 
in my honest opinion, it seemed, to me, to be a beacon or a sign. it was not a flash but rather a quick brightening and dimming. or a pulse perhaps. one bright pulse, one minute later a repeat and then nothing.
 the very next morning at about the same time i was in the same position. gazing up. almost due south i saw something get very bright. being prepared this time i actually saw it as it dimmed. i could see what appeared to be a distant star-like object or satellite moving. it was moving in an easterly direction at a high rate of speed. faster than any satellite i have ever observed. it then dimmed to nothing and disappeared completely.
 i live by bush intercontinental, hobby and la porte airports and i'm used to planes and their lights. i have seen space shuttles and the iss fly over. i have never seen anything that lit up so bright and, at least, seemed so distant. like a pulsar. 
 i was awed by this experience and know that what i witnessed was something unique. not just once but twice on two days, consecutively. 
 i still believe it was a sign or beacon.
content.summary: Bright flashes of light

content.detailedDescription: Walked out of apt with my dogs looked up a plane was taking off .It was  a higher than the plane was but lower than the clouds .Moving at very high rate of speed .It flew into philadelphia airport air space but not in normal flight pattern .Came from the west going east.It left my sight because it flew to far away.It was a bluish triangular shape no wings.3rd ufo i ever saw first time reporting.Thought it was cool but just observed it . it flew in a straight pattern west to east .Continued to walk dogs .Then i came inside looked up ufo on my ps3.
content.summary: Triangular bluish

content.detailedDescription: Decided to write this after viewing your event map and noting, that a person in new berlin reported seeing a cigar with windows stop over greenfield park someime around oct 31, 1977 which hovered over a group of ice skaters for approximately ten minutes once and then returned for period of one minute disappearing quickly!  i reported a similar encounter by myself on the road between cedarville, ohio and south chrarleston, ohio approximately in the spring of 2006 on peter davenport's site, nuforc.Com if you want to look it up!  the cigar had lighted portholes.  the object descended rapidly to fly parallel to my car while i was driving home from classes at payne theological seminary.  it first appeared to be a very bright star and then came down so fast, that i was shocked, but couldn't pull over anywhere as that part of the road was narrow and had drainage ditches on both sides.  the craft skimmed the top of the ground without any sound.  it was a clear and warm evening and i had my car windows down!  it rose rapidly and became a star again sitting in the sky over cedarville.  i went down the road to find a place to pull over and after a mile or so found a truck pull-off and kept looking backward to watch the thing as much as possible without running off the road.  there was no other traffic!  it was so amazing that i still think about it today every time i drive through that area.  never saw anything like that before or since.  the object looked alot like the drawing submitted by the person who reported the greenfield park sighting.  incidentally, i worked in new berlin nearly forty years ago and used to go by greenfield park to run and job in the early 80's while living in west allis, wi which is contiguous to that are!  strange coincidence isn't it???
content.summary: Strange coincidences???

content.detailedDescription: Myself, a friend from back east, and another friend from santa barbara were on the roof of my friends approximately four story apartment building between the hours of 3:00 am and 4:00 am sometime in early july of 2009 when as we were talking, out of the corner of my eye and to the surprise of the other two individuals appeared out of nowhere and formed as if were being hand drawn in the sky the shape of a half rainbow. the color of the light was predominantly green but had essences of other colors within it. it happened over a residential neighborhood in hollywood near the hills. there was no sound so i don't think it was a fire work nor any man made display of any kind, not to mention it was approximately 700 feet away around 60 degrees from directly in front of us. more disturbing than the suddenness of the incident was the duration, lasting only a few seconds; 30 seconds at most. as the greenish rainbow shape like vapor trail in the sky dissipated i could make out an object in my minds eye similar to that of a traditional grey saucer sinking just below tree level within the adjacent neighborhood, and just as it had come it was gone. the three of us looked at each-other in awe, silent for a few moments before i broke the silence in an attempt to quickly recap what just happened so we wouldn't forget it. i feel it is only natural human psychology to try to reason ones way into an explanation, much the way the brain can play tricks on you convincing you that things are there that aren't, on the flip-side it can also try to bend the truth so that the reality we find ourselves forced to process can fit into our definition of understanding and normalcy. i immediately said "did you see that? don't forget what that was. we saw a light and a craft, did you all see the craft?" they both nodded. my friend remarked, "what does it mean?" having an inherent interest in the ufo phenomenon, i replied "nothing, they screwed up, maybe their shield came off, and we weren't supposed to see that." after all it was quite late, or early should i say,  who are they to know anyone would be up here watching. i haven't talked to one of my friends since that night. i had a third friend who was with us that night, but he was downstairs inside and asleep. i told him what we had witnessed and without thinking twice he dismissed it as nothing more than a misidentified what have you. a week went by before he non-chalantly says to me; "oh yeah, that green light thing you saw in the sky, i saw it too."
content.summary: Bright predominantly green rainbow formed flash of light/vapor trail lead by silent silver disc shaped craft spotted by 3 witnesses over hollywood residential area between 3 and 4 am in july of 2009.

content.detailedDescription: Okay me and about 10 or 11 of my friends where up around like 4 o'clock in the morning smoking a cigarette and saw an very odd thing in the sky. you could tell it was far off in the distance but yet close to our atmosphere, it was huge and moving. looked almost as if it was something blowing up in the sky.. but it wasn't it stayed in the sky for about an hour and all we did was watch it... i cant explain what it was but i can say this.. it was nothing me or any of my friend have ever seen before.. another way to describe it is a huge star a yellowish orange color.. it was tall long ways but short wide ways almost like a cross but it was like a fire in the sky.. and when i say huge i mean big.. and when a cloud passed over it it disappeared.. i don't know what it was or what it could have been but if you have any ideas please let me know. their was also no report done and i do have witnesses plenty of them so please help me figure this out thank you.
content.summary: Explosion and fire star in the sky close but far

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in james bible park in awe of the rising crescent moon aligned with venus, i was watching a plane at very high altitude pass overhead when i noticed what at first appeared to be a satellite pass in a perpendicular path to that of the aircraft. then the light went out and reappeared 3 times over about 30 seconds as the object moved across the sky. then about ten minutes later i witnessed two more traveling towards eachother. i thought for sure they would collide. one of these was dim like a satellite the other was very bright. after that i called 911 so i could have an official recorded reporting. then as i was on the phone with 911 i saw a fourth one and gave a detailed description to the man at dispatch. i am a very intelligent man and have been stargazing my whole life. these were not satellites any more than they could have been weather balloons. these in my humble opinion were bonified genuine ufo's. again they looked like a really bright venus or star but they travelled at high velocities and would sometimes get dim or disappear as they were moving. the sightings always seemed to occur in the wake of a traveling plane.
content.summary: Looked like  really really bright stars, over the course of a couple hours i saw 5

content.detailedDescription:
The date i entered is approximate; it���s been a few years since the encounter.  many of us (50-100) were skating on the local pond in greenfield park, new berlin, wisconsin.  this object came directly over us and stopped.  i recall seeing it coming towards us from the south, it had caught my eye, and it seemed like it had found some interest in what we were doing and headed our way. i didn't look like anything i have ever seen before. it was about a 100 yards up and stopped directly over us. many didn't see it at first, it was completely silent, and people kept skating about, it just sat there as if someone was watching us.  soon everyone was looking up.  some moms were grabbing their kids and went into building screaming, but most of us stopped and got into a stair down contest with it.  it was there for about 10 min. it then slowly wet across to the north.  things kind of went back to normal, but after about an hour, it came back from the north, stopped over us again, but only for about a minute. it left going back south, but when it left it took off faster than anything i have ever seen to this date. in a little less than a blink of an eye.

the complete details of what it looked liked are vague as it was at night.  its shape was of a narrow blimp or of a fat cigar it had a row of square white lights circling completely around it.  i didn't see any wings, tips, or protrusions.

when i got home and told my family about the event, my mother called the local news and at that time, they didn't know about it, and did not persue the story to my knowledge.

i would like to know if anyone else has reported the same encounter.

the picture i drew is what i remember but it traveled on a 45 degree angle.
content.summary: The same object visited us (50-100) twice as we were ice-skating.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at whipsnade zoo, dunstable, england with my partner and daughter sitting on a bench having some lunch by the elephant enclosure when i noticed right in the distance an extremely large object in the sky it was right in the distance and an air balloon looks like a spec from a distance but this thing was much larger than an air balloon.
i watched it moving very slowly then decided to use my camera to zoom in to the max so i could get a better view. the picture i got looks like a very large flag with some symbols on it, but the weird thing is the size is out of proportion to the trees. there doesn't appear to be any kind of flag pole attached to it either. there were para gliders about this day but i dismiss it as that. i only took the one photo and the flag shaped object continued to move slowly and disappeared behind the trees. after i got home i tried to blow the picture up but i still can't make the symbols out, however i made another discovery there are 2 saucer shapes in the sky near by. on seeing i have captured 2 saucer shapes in my photo i actually feel excited i have witnesses some kind of ufo.
please take a look at the photo the first saucer shape if you look at the flag at the top right corner follow it out diagonally and you will see it and the other is below it near the treetops.
content.summary: Large flag shape object, 2 saucer shapes near by

content.detailedDescription: Was standing outside with a friend at work taking a leak when i noticed an object we both thought was a satelite. the object was travelling from north to south then just stopped> the object became very bright has been loitering in general area moving up and down in a circulur pattern. between myself and six co-workers, two customers we feel very confused and excited one of the coworkers got sick and went home. we are still looking at the object a crowd is growing may 16th 12:57am wish we had a camera that could take a pic it wont show on are cell cams. hope someone else is watching this who can film tried to call the observitory, mufon, etc no success
content.summary: Looked like a satelite

content.detailedDescription:
At around 7pm 15th may 2010 i witnessed what i thought was a satellite, however it was travelling faster than other's i have seen. as i prepared to video the object with my phone, the object slowed and came to a halt. from the time it started to slow to the time it stopped took 4 to 5 seconds. once it had stopped it quickly (1 sec) faded from view. the object was about the size and luminosity of jupiter when you can just make out it's four major moons. perhaps slightly larger. 

upon reviewing the video i could find nothing. 

the entire sighting lasted about 20 seconds.

i searched the internet for satellite information to see if there were any corresponding flyovers for that time but the only one's i could find were well east of my position. 

the object i saw tracked north to south flying and stopping directly overhead before disappearing. i live in the suburb of embleton, perth w.Aust.
content.summary: Looked like a large satellite but it slowed down and stopped.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bathroom looking out the window when i saw what at first what looked like a shooting star. i noticed that it was moving to slow for a shooting star, and to fast for a plane. it was heading east along a known flight path. i didn't see any other light on it. the light was to bright to make out any betails of the object. then the lights brightness droped to nothing and vanished leaving no trace. the hole time it didn't change course or speed. i don't know what it was but it filled me with wonder.
content.summary: Briliant white like a shooting star moving slowly.

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:35 pm this evening (est) we (family and friends) saw an unusual light in the north west sky.  it appeared to be like a burning object, red/yellow/orange color and the light pulsed brighter. it approached slowly and was about the size of a pencil eraser to the naked eye.  it flew to the south east and never appeared to get lower or higher in the sky.  there was no sound like an airplane engine, even though it was close enough to have heard an engine.  it appeared to be somewhat v-shaped.  then turned and flew off to the left into clouds.  watched its flight path for about 2 minutes.  sky was cloudy and no stars were visible.  we saw this sighting in powell, ohio just north of columbus, ohio, usa.  we have never seen anything like this before. enclosed is a photo (if blown up, shows object's shape) and a short video.
content.summary: Red/yellow burning object, that pulsed as it flew slowly in night sky. v-shaped

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this rectangular object on may 14th, 2010 while reviewing my pictures. one more for the collection of strange objects seen after the fact on photographs. open to interpretations. 

taken mar 16, 2005, 6:59 pm
content.summary: Photo of 2005, rectanguar object

content.detailedDescription:
Driving northbound on the 55, between katella and lincoln shortly after 10:35pm, my friend and i noticed a very bright blue light that pulsated over the duration of approximately 2 seconds in an on/off pattern. it took about 0.75 seconds to fade from lit to unlit, waited approximately 2 seconds then another 0.75 or so seconds to light back up, then remained lit for another app. 2 seconds. also, there was a much smaller red light that seemed to be not so obvious and almost tucked into it, where it was only visible at certain times but not others.

i don't believe in aliens visiting us, to be honest, and i would normally dismiss this as a low flying helicopter, specially given that there was a red and blue light, one could assume it was a police helicopter. however, this was not very low and proceeded to "leap" during the bright portions of the light cycle and i've also never seen a police helicopter pulsate and this length of oscillation. this light moved in correlation with the brightness in an almost logarithmic way. so as it lit up, it started to move faster until it was at full brightness where it maintained speed, then slowed down as the light dimmed again. it reminded us both of the children's game called leapfrog, except that it was completely lateral.

there was a lot of apparently odd characteristics that left us both very confused. we are both very used to seeing police helicopters and even ordinary helicopters, but we were both convinced that this behaved unlike anything we've ever seen before.

it's a little difficult to explain why this was to abnormal, but i'll try my best. as the light "dimmed" off the location seemed to slow. during it's off-cycle the light remained apparently stationary. then, during each "pulse" of light, it apparently gained speed until it was completely lit, dashed a few hundred yards, slowed down as the light dimmed, where it appeared to remain stationary again during it's off-cycle.

i tried as hard as i could to debunk it, thinking maybe it was a stationary light that only appeared to move during the on-cycles, except that when we first saw it, we were 300 yards north from kattella and it's origin was to the left of the freeway (northwest of the 55 at lincoln), within approximately 1-2 minutes, after crossing under the meats overpass it was on the right (which was approximately southeast in the direction of katella to where it was over the hills that are by irvine regional park.)

the freeway is very straight at this location and when it bent we lost sight of the light because of the roof of the car on the passengers side. if you look at this area you will see that if the light was at on the left during the straightaway, then it would have to be moving to be obscured by the back part of the roof of our vehicle at this bend.

http://maps.Google.Com/?Ie=utf8&ll=33.819303,-117.828112&spn=0.025564,0.049782&z=15

here's an idea of the direction of travel when compared to our location and it's apparent proximity to us.

http://img.Skitch.Com/20100516-gg3b83hnb1mfnmmwefamtbwxmm.Jpg

this was a very interesting experience and we are not sure exactly what it was. we are also looking forward to any other witness testimony, i suppose in an attempt to solve this but at a minimum, at least prove that we are not crazy.

either way, thank you for your time and please contact me directly if you saw this light, too. http://scr.Im/nevery
content.summary: Oscillating blue light that "leaped" horizontally per strobe.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were driving back home around 11:15pm, and spotted a weird looking burnt-orange colored glowing ball in the sky. as this is the only road we can take to get home, we're on it just about every night. we know there aren't any streetlights/radio towers/etc that could have explained this odd sighting; and we know what stars are commonly seen.

as we were cresting a hill, there appeared a large and brightly glowing orange orb. it was like an old orangy-looking streetlight in color. it appeared to be very far off, beyond average plane height; and seemed to be staying in place. after a few moments the object gave the impression of growing larger, then returned to its original size. it then started slowly moving north-east, as it picked up speed. we lost sight of the object as we continued driving.

the entire event lasted no more than 20 minutes, from what we could see.
it didn't appear ominous or interactive. it sat there like it was observing something, or waiting for something.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large orange glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: I was backing out of my driveway when i noticed a huge light in the sky that was much bigger than any star near it. from the naked eye, it appeared to be star-like in color, only much brighter. i pulled back into the driveway and told my parents to come outside and look at the object. at fist my father declared it to be the north star, because of its size. i went inside to get my camera and some binoculars while they kept an eye on the object. it seemed to fade in and out at times but this may be due to clouds coming in at the same time. through the binoculars we could see three points of light but couldnt tell if it was the same object or three seperate ones. i took 5 pictures but only the last one showed anything but complete blackness. i have no idea what they are, but it seems they are three seperate objects because the stars are clearly visible between them. we lost sight of the object after about 25 minutes due to clouds and the fact that it was very slowly moving away. as incredible as this picture looks, it is in fact 100% real! i will keep these images on my camera for further study by professionals, thank you for your time.
content.summary: Three balls of blue and yellow lights in a triangle formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friends house at about 12:30am.I glanced up to see a roundish cloud just above me.3 lights appeared in the center of the cloud forming a triangle.Before i had time react,i woke up walking down the middle of the road three blocks from where i seen the lights.I had no memory of seeing the lights at all.I did notice that it was 5:ooam when i got home.This did not even register in mind at all.I had no memory of this event until three or four months later.When i started to put this all together i realized that i was missing about three hours time.To this day i cannot recall how i walked around the corner towards my house or why it took me four hours to get home when it was a 15 minute walk.This has puzzled me for over 30 years now.The last couple of years it has become more important to me and bothering me more and more.What i would like is if anyone else has had something like this happen to them and i would also like to know where the missing time went.If anyone can help,please contact me by e-mail.This actually happened so i would ask that no skeptics contact me to tell me i'm nuts.
content.summary: Saw 3 lights in a triangle shape and had a loss of time.

content.detailedDescription:
It was early evening, around dinner time on a late august sunday.  i went with my friend, her parents, her father's boss & his wife, & my friend's little brother, out to their dock in the back of their property to see the view of the north river and marsh.  the boss & his wife were on a short visit from the south (georgia?)  it was a nice, warm early summer evening, with still an hour or 2 of daylight left.  i was 13 or 14 years old.

while we were standing on the dock looking at the view, a ufo came from the left (the hanover side of the river), at about treetop level, and moved aross to the right.  it moved slowly across our view, about 100-125 ft. off the ground and it made a very light hiss.  it was sort of a buffed-silver/taupe color with no windows, about 50 ft. across, round diameter, flat on the top and bottom. 

we just stood there looking at it, & finally the boss said, what is that!"  nobody said another word. it went out of view behind the trees on our side of the river.

i wanted to go get a canoe or leave on my bicycle to see if i could follow it, (i was wondering if it was going to land in the marsh) but i knew her parents wouldn't allow it.  i think they didn't want to discuss it or react because they didn't want to "scare the children." i thought if they thought i was going to pursue it, they would call my parents.

it was broad daylight, and the ufo was quite close and low, so there was no mistaking what we were looking at. 

this was about 2 weeks before school started back. i don't think i ever saw my friend again. i have wondered if the boss was there to tell them he needed them to move someplace else.  they were from down south, and were affluent. her father had an executive job.
content.summary: 7 people including me witnessed low-flying ufo about 500 ft. at treetop level over river/marsh.

content.detailedDescription:
it was at dusk and my family and i returned from grocery shopping.  i parked my pontiac at the curb in front of the house and we all carried in bags of groceries up the sidewalk leading to the house.  my wife enter the front door first, followed by my two daughters, age 10 years and 12 years, then my son, age 14 years.  as i walked up the two steps to the small porch i looked up in the sky and out of the corner of my eye saw moment.  there were no clouds in the sky. the object was traveling slowly west to east.  it was huge and i called my family to come quickly.  we all stood on the porch and i said, ���don���t talk, observe everything and we���ll talk later���.

it was about three telephone poles high, (120 feet high), moving very slow.  we lived in the suburbs, no was one was outside and there was no traffic.  we were one house from the corner intersection.  the object was across the intersection to our right.  the object extended over four houses and their yards plus the street making it about 500 feet (approx) from the leading to the trailing edge. it had multi-colored flashing lights around the parameter of the edge.

no sound whatsoever was heard.  it moved past the houses over a level field for about one mile away from me.  off in the distance i remember how bright the lights were on a very busy street running north and south one mile in the distance, and thought to myself about all the people who would see this object. 

we watch the object move over the distant street, another one-forth of a mile over business, including a large parking area for fedco.  it then moved over a highway (395) and about another one eighth mile to another field that was near the end of montgomery airport, (where i had flown as a student pilot).  it stopped and a white light (that you could see through) shown down from the perimeter of the object to the field below; it now seemed to be only 50 feet above the field.  then, in the center of the object, small opaque white pieces of irregular shape,(about the size of a football) fell to the ground.  then the lights below the object went off, a moment pause, and the object zipped into the sky at about 30 degrees, becoming a small dot of white as it disappeared in the upper atmosphere.

misc info: i was an amateur astronomer (ground my own 6" lens).  after seeing the object we just sat at the table saying nothing and very calm. my son did not see red lights but he saw green lights among other colors.  i don���t remember seeing the color green, but rather red.  could the flashing lights be a means of tranquilizing human?   nothing was ever seen in the newspapers.
my wife, a staunch baptist, would never talk about the incident.
content.summary: Circular, approx 150 feet in diameter, thin at edge to bulging at center. additional dome on top side of bulge.

content.detailedDescription: My husband, daughter, 2 sons and myself were driving down the road (i was front seat passenger) from my daughters softball game. i was looking out the side window and saw something bright shiny silver in the sky, it looked like when the sun shines off of metal. i noticed an airplane flying above it and one to the side (they both had the trail of white behind them) but i did not see any lights or smoke near the silvery object. i told my husband to look in the direction i was looking underneath where the airplane was to see if he could see what i was seeing. he and my daughter both looked and saw it. i then asked him what it could be and he stated he's never seen anything like it. it appeared to remain stationary in the sky (not near the ground) for about 5 minutes then when i blinked my eyes it was gone. i did notice i was seeing what appeared to be spots as if i was staring into a bright light. we were only several miles from fort leavenworth army base and it was a clear day.
content.summary: Shiny silver object hovering in one spot, daylight no clouds 2 airplanes nearby.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working for my dad who was in the plubming busines. i was on a service call about 8:30pm in june. i saw what looked like a fire ball over white lake. it didn't move and i watched it on my way home it didn't move and stayed in about the smae place for about an hr.. it finely just looked like it just got smaller and disapeared. it might have droped in to the lake at that point i don't know? i wish i had told some one then, but in those days you didn't want to seam like you were crazy. if you want to call me i could take you to the place were i saw it so many years ago. thanks gene

ps. if i could be of any help just let me knnow
content.summary: Looked like a ball burning but stayed in air over an hr.

content.detailedDescription: One night i decided to go outside and observe a meteor shower in november 2009.  the shower was supposed to begin at 11:00 pm.  i went outside about 10:56 pm and began observing the night sky in hopes to see a meteor.  the night was clear and very cold.  i was looking up towards the north sky and no more than a few minutes of observing i saw something that was of great amazement.  i observed a flashing/strobing white light that all of a sudden appeared real high up in the night sky.  i observed the object for about thirty seconds to a minute.  the object continued flashing and then it moved a little bit east and then went west and back east.  these movements were not that great in distance.  then all of a sudden the object shot east very quickly.  it headed towards chicago.  i continued observing the object and then it shot very swiftly south.  it traveled in an l shaped pattern.  then i lost sight like it vanished.  wow was i amazed.  i then looked back at the original starting point and saw another object appeared flashing/strobing. the object repeated the same pattern as the previous object.  it went a little bit east then came back west and then east.  the object shot east towards chicago and then moved south and vanished into the night sky.  both objects repeated the same movements and patterns.  these things did not move like anything i've ever seen.  the objects shot across the night sky.  i ran into the house and told my wife and she did not believe me.  i've told friends and family and most of them give me a weird stare.  i know what i saw and it was definitely a ufo.  i've had an interset with ufos for about 15 years.  this is my first ever sighting.
content.summary: Flashing/strobing light that shot like a bullet then another object repeated same pattern

content.detailedDescription:
this event happened sometime between summer of 1951 and summer of 1955. i had gone to church on a saturday afternnon to go to confession. the church is on whittenton street across bay street. after confession i left the church from a door opposite the one i had entered. there is a palyground at the end of 5th ave and i was heading there to look for my friends. after leaving the church i was immediately surprised at the silence outside. there was no sound of cars on whittenton street, at the time 5th ave. was home to many french speaking families.There were no sounds of children playing and no sound of the old french speaking people on their porches speaking to each other. these people could be very loud as they talked to others next door and even 2 houses away. there was not even birds chirping. the silence was deafening.
     i looked to my left and saw no cars passing in front of the church, then as i turned to my right i noticed this thing hanging in the air above this huge old oak tree at the top of the hill on 5th ave. at first i didn't have any idea what i was looking at. i was maybe 11 to 13 years old at the time. i can still see this thing as clearly in my mind today at 70 yeas of age as at the time it occured. i was looking at a round disc shaped object hovering above the huge old tree at the top of the hill. it was larger in diameter the the tree and was maybe 20 feet above the tree. the top of the object seemed to be rotating in one direction and the bottom was rotating in the opposite driection with a stationary center section. there was a row of big what i can only describe as windows but they were not windows as we think of them. the street is not very long maybe 150 feet at most. so i was very close to the thing. i was simply stunned! i just stood there for a few minutes looking at this thing. even today i can still see this figure in the center section kind of leaning with outspread arms on something and looking directly at me. at the time i was convinced it was looking directly at me. suddenly i felt that someone was telling me to be calm and be quiet and that things would be ok. it felt like waves of calm were radiating out from this object. all of a sudden it was like my body came back to me and i turned around and went back into the church and down the stairs to the center of the church. i stayed there for a time and remember seeing my aunt leaving the main part of the church. i quietly went to the door i came in and all of a sudden i slammed the crash bar and left the church and without looking anywhere except straight ahead i ran just as fast as my legs could move to my home which was maybe 200 yards directly across bay stree and on another section of whittenton street. my home was in the 3rd house on this section on the right of the street.  i stayed in the house the rest of the day and knew that if i went outside that thing would be there looking for me.
       a few days later  my mom took my brother and sisters and me to my aunts house. after we got there and visited a while my aunt asked me why i didn't say hi to her in the church. i told her i was scared and she asked me if it was because of the thing in the sky. she had seen it too and promptly went back into the church to wait inside for my uncle to pick her up. she and i both agreed on just about everything axcept the waves of calmness, she was only outside for a few seconds before returning inside.
       there was an empty hall just catty corner across the street from my home. one of the churches in the area was using this hall as a church while their church was being demolished and a new one built. one sunday morning after attending mass i was leaving this church and for some reason looked up in the sky and to my astonishment there was the same object slowly rising straight up and i lost sight of it as it disappeared into the clouds. again i ran home as fast as i could and never said a word to anyone bout this event.  
         i swear these things happened to me and my aunt. both churches are still there. the playground still exists, all the houses are still there.  the hall still exists. sadly my aunt passed away a few months ago but she did tell my mother what happened and my mother is still living. i am writing this now because i happened to turn on the history chanell and watched the program u f o hunters. i have never comunicated this to anyone outside my family because i didn' t want to be seen as a nut case.
content.summary: A large circular disc hovering above a tree.

content.detailedDescription:
Was on our way to williamstown ky on rt22 and about halfway there saw people pointing up to the sky, as we looked up my wife and my self saw some kind of objects in the sky we just happened to have our vido camera with us and my wife tried to take a shot with the camera but she forgot to take the cover off the lens so i stoped and removed the lens and started to file what was in the sky when we first seen them they close enough to tell that they were big and just as i started to film them some jets flew over and they moved away fast so i filmed what i could.
after i filmed about 2mins. i lost sight of them .I have no ideal what they were all i know is the jets were interested in them.

the three objects were flying in formation like a flock of geese ( v )
they were moving slow until the jets showed up then they quickly picked up speed.
my wife and i were very excited when we seen them we had never seen anything like them before.
they changed cours and moved out of sight.
content.summary: Saw three big objects in sky took video also saw airforce jets following them

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 12 or 13 years old.  me and my friend were shooting bb guns in his back yard.  looking around for birds to shoot.  he saw a black dot in the sky and he said he saw a smaller dot come out of it.  i could barely see the first dot, but i think i did.  about 5 minutes later we saw a silver or aluminum disc (it was rounded and convex on bottom) flying very slowly over the roof of his house (we were in his back yard).  there were some telephone lines behind the houses across the street from his house.  it appeared about as wide a house with two slits or windows in the edge and about 5 feet or more in height.  it made a humming noise like a humming transformer which varied slowly in intensity (up and then down and repeated).  i think i saw motion in the window/slits but am not sure of this.  it went slowly then sped up, then went so fast it seemed to dissapear.  it was about a block away when it dissapeared.  about a minute or less after that two jet planes (scopions) flew over the same telephone lines.  i never seen jets fly that close to our homes before.  we ran into to his house to tell his family, they laughed at us.  i went home to tell my family and they didn't believe me also.  there was no news of sightings that evening either.

we lived about a block away from northrop airport in hawthorne california.  they were famous for flying wing airplanes, etc.
content.summary: It flew over some telephone lines slowly then sped off quickly.

content.detailedDescription: I have had this unidenfied object in my foot the poditrist said he had no idea what is is. it is hard to remove attchecd to the nearves and it olny causes paid if it is like struck or or some way hit but otherwise it is connected to my body and several dr's have not been able to idenify it. i have mri's, cat scans, xrays and another study that i forget what type. i would like to have it removed not destroyed with a lazer removal device or other. oh its not a plnaters wart, its not a sist its unidenified. they have no idea what it is. it may be nothing but rater then destroy what mybe some sort of evidence for your group. i would volinter to have it removed by somone who can do it without damaging my foor. but i think it may be some sort of tag honestly i don't and dr's don't know. let me know if you can help or even if you can't. i do have insurance. i think i belive in ufo's but i would like to see some proof. thanks john sorry about the spelling.
content.summary: Implant in foot

content.detailedDescription:
It was a friday around 12 whin i decide to have lunch i boiled pasta and took it in my backyard to eat whin i walked out i had an eary feeling that something was watching me and there was a strong sulfur like smell in the air whin i noticed the craft it was over the nabors house less than ten feet off the ground and it was spining in a clockwise motion it slowley loomed over my property line and my dog started barcking i saw a black  shiny object fall off craft and land in my pool i havent removed it for research purposes . after it droped the object the craft started spinning upword extreamly fast i ran to get my camera but it was gone before i got back there was also a large tar like stain under where the craft was hovering it stank of chloride and killed the grass i have that section of my yard blocked off until u get here please come i have physical evidince in my pool and stains on my grass and i am very fasinated to findout what your take on it is.
sicerley 
jim
content.summary: oval  object floated over the house
